jazz.name: So What
jazz.author: Miles Davis
jazz.desc: The opening track on legendary trumpeter Miles’ landmark album Kin d Of Blue is one of the best-known examples of modal jazz.

jazz.name: Fly Me To The Moon
jazz.author: Frank Sinatra
jazz.desc: Originally penned by Bart Howard in 1954 and also recorded by Nat ‘King’ Cole, Peggy Lee and more. The definitive version, though, is surely Frank’s 1964 recording.

rock.name: Purple Haze
rock.author: Jimi Hendrix
rock.desc: There are famous riffs, and then there's Purple Haze.
